title: Lululemon’s Gift Shop Is Here: 24 Styles To Check People Off Your List
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here. When it comes to coveted pieces for the movement- and comfort-obsessed, Lululemon is the ultimate one-stop shop. From the brand’s signature ultra-soft leggings to wear-everywhere hoodies we’d happily live in, it’s no surprise the activewear haven is a reader favorite year-round — and a go-to destination for all things holiday gifting, with options for every budget.Lululemon’s gift shop open for business, so we suggest shopping ASAP — only orders placed by December 20 will arrive by Christmas Eve. While you’re at it, why not treat yourself to something, too? From stylish accessories to splurge-worthy outerwear, ahead is an all-star guide to Lululemon’s best styles combining form and function. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Apparel Gifts From breezy joggers to casual dresses, Lululemon’s got options for way more than breaking a sweat in. And honestly, what are the holidays without a full day of couch rotting in the brand’s Softstreme fabric? DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Bag Gifts Lululemon’s bags cover every activity and occasion, making them perfect for gifting. Think festive updates to the cult-favorite Everywhere Belt Bag (hello, fleece and iridescent finishes) alongside winter-white bucket bags and plush totes — all ready to wrap up for the season. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Outerwear Gifts Quality outerwear is a gifting win, and Lululemon’s lineup delivers. From trendy puffer jackets and vests to vibrant, jewel-toned Define Jackets, these styles are perfect for layering — and for spoiling someone who’s been extra good this year. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Accessories Gifts Shopping on a budget? Lululemon’s under-$100 gifts have you covered via these accessory gift guides for her and for him. From cozy cashmere, warm merino wool, and plush fleece to sparkling festive water bottles, the answer to: “Wait, they make that too?” is a resounding “Yes!” DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Leggings Gifts Treat yourself or your on-the-go bestie to a sure-to-delight surprise: Lululemon leggings. With fan favorites like Align and Wunder Train dropping in dazzling new colors, there’s a perfect pick for everyone on your list. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Gifts For Men Don’t forget the fellas! Top-rated joggers and slides make for the ultimate off-duty staples, while flannel button-downs and vests are winter-adventure-ready. Shop full Lululemon gift guide Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?Fill Your Fall Wardrobe With Lululemon Activewear20 Gifts He Doesn't Know He Actually NeedsFree People Movement Is Your One-Stop Holiday Shop
author: Karina Hoshikawa

title: Skims’ Collab With The North Face Is Here — And It’s Every Snow Bunny’s Dream
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. If you thought you’d reached peak après-ski inspo on your Pinterest feed, think again: Skims just launched a collaboration with winter outerwear giant The North Face — and it’s giving chic, cozy chalet vibes. “This marks Skims first-ever foray into the world of winter wear, and partnering with The North Face allowed us to leverage their expertise in this category,” said Kim Kardashian, Skims co-founder and chief creative officer, in a press release. “I’ve spent a lot of time on the slopes, so I was definitely inspired when we were developing this collection and I can’t wait to wear these pieces on my next trip.”  The ski-inspired collection includes a range of cropped puffer jackets, skin-tight jumpsuits, layering tops, gloves, headwear, and more. It blends The North Face’s iconic, functional designs with Skims’ body-hugging silhouettes and signature neutrals. The result? Mixed-and-matched layers or striking monochromatic looks, perfect for winter activities — from ice skating and skiing to holiday shopping and hot cocoa dates.Sizes range from XXS through 3X in most apparel styles, and mule sizes 5 through 11; prices start at $60 for a beanie and go up to $1,200 for a down one-piece.“At The North Face, we always put innovation and functionality first, the collaboration space is no exception. With Skims, we maintained best-in-class constructions and materials and this collaboration came about from a mutual admiration,” said David Whetstone, North Face director of collaborations and energy, in the press release.  Whether you’re stocking up on cozy season essentials or leaning into Pantone’s Mocha Mousse, this collection will have you bundled up and looking good all winter long. Shop the full The North Face x Skims collaboration Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?How 4 Editors Wore Skims' Puzzling 30-Way BraR29 Editors’ 12 Favorite Cozy Season Fashion PicksKate Moss Launched a Zara Partywear Collection

title: Shop Our Favorite Picks From Abercrombie & Fitch While They're 30% Off
description: Who would have thought that our closets would be filled with Abercrombie & Fitch again?! Abercrombie has long been famous for its expansive collection of flattering jeans, which are editor-loved. But recently, the retailer went through a little makeover of its own; long gone are the days of logo-filled graphic T-shirts and limited denim offerings, now the brand is a haven for all types of fashion-lovers - and sizes. It's the best place to shop for everything from stylish, elevated basics to vintage-inspired looks, seasonal trends, and even wedding guest dresses. The brand is clearly back and better than ever, and if TikTok hasn't already convinced you to shop at Abercrombie, let us do that for you. From trendy tops and elevated dresses to comfortable, tailored bottoms, Abercrombie has become synonymous with effortlessly chic clothing. The brand carries everything you need for a fashion-forward closet. From classic denim to its flattering silhouettes and expanded size range, Abercrombie has something for everyone. Plus, if something doesn't fit quite right, or the color you've been eyeing is finally back in stock, the brand makes it convenient to file a return or exchange. Abercrombie & Fitch's Return Policy Abercrombie and Fitch has a return policy of 30 days from the date of the last shipment, as long as you have your receipt, invoice, or order confirmation. Returns received after the 30-day mark will be refunded in an e-gift card for merchandise credit. If you love a style but just need a different size or color, you can exchange it in store or online through this return portal. Active Abercrombie & Fitch Promo Codes and Sales Right now, you can get 30 percent off select styles ahead of the holidays for a limited time. You can also get an extra 15 percent off all coats and jackets, which is automatically applied at checkout. Plus, you can get free shipping when you spend $99 or more. We love browsing the site for the brand's newest arrivals and even scoring a deal or two on a few pieces. So we decided to make your life easier and rounded up our current favorite wardrobe essentials and dresses from Abercrombie, both new and on sale, so you know what's worth buying - especially for the winter. Keep reading to shop our top picks from Abercrombie & Fitch, or jump ahead to the category you're looking for. Shop Editor-Favorite Picks From Abercrombie & Fitch Shop Abercrombie & Fitch Dresses Shop Abercrombie & Fitch New Clothing
author: Anvita Reddy

title: TikTok Is Obsessed With Abercrombie Jeans, Shop Our Favorite Styles on Sale
description: You can never have enough pairs of comfortable and stylish jeans, and as shopping editors, we're always on the hunt for the best ones. TikTok has been obsessed with Abercrombie's assortment of jeans for quite some time. In fact, the brand gained a whole new crop of fans and admirers after the brand's Curve Love straight jeans were spotted on Francia Raísa's character in "How I Met Your Father." Even our editors are fans of the brand's wardrobe essentials and the new NFL collection, both of which pair beautifully with the brand's denim lineup. If you want to try these fan-favorite jeans for yourself, we curated some of the top styles you need in your closet - including several bestselling styles on sale. Standout denim styles include the editor-backed '90s straight jeans and mom jeans. The Curve Love collection is also on sale and it's equipped with an additional two inches at the hips and thighs, giving you a comfortable yet figure-flattering look that hugs your curves in all the right places. Each pair comes in a variety of washes and designs, too. Whether you're in the market for a crisscross waistband or a distressed look, the list ahead includes all the latest denim trends. These styles also accommodate height with length options ranging from extra short to long. Ahead, you can shop our favorite denim shorts and timeless jeans from Abercrombie. Some washes and styles are up to 30 percent off, so stock up while you can!
author: Anvita Reddy

title: Glam it up, guys: partywear for men – in pictures
description: You can always rely on monochrome for an event look, but texture keeps it interestingWe’re a week into December and the party season is in full swing. If you’re struggling with the age old ‘what to wear’ conundrum, keep it simple. Stick with black and white and experiment with texture, it’s a versatile way to supercharge your outfit. Dolce and Gabbana’s AW24 collection is a master class in how to nail the look. Aim for contrasting textures to layer up: silk under wool, or velvet with lace adds a modern edge to the party look. Look for black-on-black embellishment for a timeless look you can wheel out every year. Reiss’s black sequin shirt (4) adds flair without being out-and-out showy, style with black trousers and loafers. Next’s subtle glitter tuxedo (8) is another affordable take on the look. For more adventurous dressers, one of the key runway trends was sheer – from full-on chest revealing transparency to more wearable gauzy shirts, like Allsaints lace one (£119) and River Island’s white lace (£46, main image above).If embellishment is too seasonal look for interesting detailing, like Represent’s zip-up jacket (2) that will look sharp long after the last champagne cork has popped on NYE . Ditto Zara’s tailored separates and Daily Paper’s chess board patterned pieces, style with a gauzy shirt for a night out, but swap in a sweater for spring. For more formal events, velvet blazers always look super chic over a fine-gauge black rollneck. Continue reading...
author: Helen Seamons and Jo Jones
